cast.name: Natasa Tic Ralijan Natasa Tic Ralijan
帕夫勒·拉夫诺里布 Pavle Ravnohrib

introduction: A group of nine boys and girls decide to go mountain climbing with unconventional equipment. They take off for the mountains with two jeeps, an off-road motorbike and some sophisticated gear which they trust implicitly. And why wouldn’t they, being creatures of an age in which nothing is impossible, given the right technology?   But suddenly the power of their techno toys starts petering out, and their optimism with it. The worst will come when they themselves start to die...   Rado, leader of the group, has planned the timing and participants meticolously, hoping to break the evil power of Morana, pagan Slav goddess of death and winter. Was it Rado who brought Morana her fresh victims? One doesn’t mess around with Morana...
